Drinks	containing	caffeine	can	
also	affect	your	baby	and	may	
keep them awake, so drink 
them only occasionally rather 
than every day while your baby 
is young.
See page 132 for more 
information on alcohol and 
breastfeeding.
Caffeine
Caffeine	occurs	naturally	
in lots of foods and drinks, 
including	coffee,	tea	and	
chocolate. It’s also added to 
some soft drinks and energy 
drinks and to some cold and 
flu	remedies.
In the early days, it is important 
that you don’t have too
